channel.title: Distrelec Jira
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6032] Distrelec URL redirect
item.description:
Could you please define the specific redirects on the following URLs if they are selected in the page settings?

www.distrelec.com to https://www.elfaelectronics.com/elfa3~ex_en/elfa/init.do?init=1&shop=ELFA_EX-EN

www.distrelec.hr to https://www.elfaelectronics.com/elfa3~ex_en/elfa/init.do?init=1&shop=ELFA_EX-EN

www.distrelec.si to https://www.elfaelectronics.com/elfa3~ex_en/elfa/init.do?init=1&shop=ELFA_EX-EN

www.distrelec.bg to https://www.elfaelectronics.com/elfa3~ex_en/elfa/init.do?init=1&shop=ELFA_EX-EN

www.distrelec.rs to https://www.elfaelectronics.com/elfa3~ex_en/elfa/init.do?init=1&shop=ELFA_EX-EN

status.description: Change Request/Bug was approved by customer, CR/Bug can be implemented/fixed

comments.comment:
I can only change the redirect URLs for HR / SI / BG / RS directly in the hMC.
I have to modify the reset later (I'm on the road).

Until when is it possible?
We are on maintenance in these countries.

@Florian: I changed the redirect target URLs for BG, HR, RS and SI. This will be released with v3.1.9. (v3.1.8 was build by Francesco this afternoon already).
In case you are deploying the v3.1.8 to production, we have to change the redirect URLs in the hMC again. (or keep the maintanance page until v3.1.8 is deployed).
Have you tested the .com redirection already? I did not change anything for .com. Redirection for .com is not yet solved!
Please solve the .com issue together with Francesco (since I am in a training until Thurdsay evening)

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6068] Import Tool - file processing error
item.description: File upload is not working correctly - its always running in a no data found exception...

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: committed in v3.1. ready for test deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6061] Website Bestellmanager
item.description:
Von: Jenzer Hansjuerg Hansjuerg.Jenzer@Eotec.ch
Gesendet: Dienstag, 16. Dezember 2014 15:15
An: FM CH DIS Info
Betreff: Website Bestellmanager

Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren

In der alten Website konnte man die vergangenen Bestellungen öffnen und
nachsehen was darin enthalten war.

Neu klappt das nicht mehr.

Bei einem Click auf den Knopf (roter Pfeil) passiert nichts vernünftiges. Die Bestellung lässt sich nicht ansehen.

 Zudem ist eine Bestellung (grüner Pfeil) als erhalten markiert, obwohl ein Teil bereits da ist und der Rest
(gemäss telefonischer Rücksprache) erst im Januar geliefert wird.

Generell:

Nicht alles was neu ist, ist auch besser.
Für mich hat es zu viel optischen Schnick-Schnack.
Die alte Seite war besser strukturiert, finde ich.

Mit freundlichen Grüssen aus Muttenz

Hansjürg Jenzer
Leiter Kommunikationssysteme
EOTEC AG | Hardstrasse 21 | CH-4132 Muttenz
Fon:             +41 61 467 90 90
Direct:          +41 61 467 91 98
Mail:             [1]hansjuerg.jenzer@eotec.ch

Service + Support:
+41 61 467 91 00
[3]service@eotec.ch

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Please check "Bestellmanager" behavior, some functions seem to be not OK.

checked some and can confirm it.

Gesendet: Dienstag, 16. Dezember 2014 15:58
An: FM CH DIS Info
Betreff: [Distrelec JIRA] (DSUP-124) WG: Website Bestellmanager

 

[1]Oliver Sautter | Distrelec assigned an issue to [2]Florian Bühler | Distrelec

 

Please check "Bestellmanager" behavior, some functions seem to be not OK.

checked some and can confirm it.

Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren

 

In der alten Website konnte man die vergangenen Bestellungen öffnen und

nachsehen was darin enthalten war.

Bei einem Click auf den Knopf (roter Pfeil) passiert nichts vernünftiges. Die Bestellung lässt sich nicht ansehen.

 

Zudem ist eine Bestellung (grüner Pfeil) als erhalten markiert, obwohl ein Teil bereits da ist und der Rest

(gemäss telefonischer Rücksprache) erst im Januar geliefert wird.

Die alte Seite war besser strukturiert, finde ich.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6054] Orderhistory - Details can't be opened
item.description:
The button to open the details of an order in the order-history has no effect. Please fix.

User: distrelec.testing+ch.b2b.2309@gmail.com
pw: distrelec

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Works fine for DE.
URL in DE: "/my-account/order-history/order-details/1000017789"
URL in CH: "/my-account/order-history/order-details/00002DNR"

The order code is different. So, in DE it causes an Exception:

WARN [hybrisHTTP34] [AccountPageController] Attempted to load a order that does not exist or is not visible
de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.exceptions.UnknownIdentifierException: CountryModel with isocode 'CH_' not found!
at de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.util.ServicesUtil.validateIfSingleResult(ServicesUtil.java:51)

Please reassign to BE to double check.
Thanks
committed in v3.1. ready for test deployment.
Please add the correct fix-version, thanks.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6014] Importtool - Normalisation of SAP product ID's
item.description: Normalisation of SAP product numbers need to be put in place for import/upload tool in order to work with those numbers.
item.summary: Importtool - Normalisation of SAP product ID's

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: committed in v3.1. ready for test deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5718] Redesign of cart review page
item.description:
Requirement

  • Initial Situation:
    • The customers don't want to scroll down to see a nice overview about their order data.
  • Requirement:
    • Remove all customer related data from the bottom to the top to have it directly on one line.

Specification: https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/911-8+Redesign+Review+Cart

Next Steps
Specification
Estimate
Implementation

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deployment
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5523] Stop rotation of Hero Teaser Component when banner is not visible
item.description:
Initial situation:
This ticket is for the two components "DistHeroTeaserComponent" and "DistExtHeroTeaserComponent" (https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-4694)
If the homepage is opend the elements (images) of those components are always rotating (timed equally) even when they are NOT in the visibility field. At the moment we are also tracking impressions of theses elements without them beeing seen (e.g. user scrolls down and looks at the carpet promo boxes)

Request:
The elements (images) of both components should only rotate when they are in the visibility field. If user scroll down the rotation of the elements should stop and keep on going if they are in the visibility field again.
item.summary: Stop rotation of Hero Teaser Component when banner is not visible

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Florian
Can you please check if our request is clear and can be implemented?
Thx, Sarah

The rotating elements of the teaser will be only tracked if they are visible.
Please test after the next deployment
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5135] Brightcover Player // Change ID for detail page
item.description:
Could you please change the ID of the Brightcove player on the product detail page?

At the moment it's: 3440179711001

<div class="gallery-item video">
<div> <object id="video-3440179711001" class="BrightcoveExperience">
<param name="bgcolor" value="#FFFFFF" />
<param name="width" value="480" />
<param name="height" value="312" />
<param name="playerID" value="3440179711001" />
<param name="playerKey" value="AQ~,AAACUpF3y2k,IByipOot93xrfhhddiTQy3pGfCyK2c2_" />
<param name="isVid" value="true" />
<param name="isUI" value="true" />
<param name="wmode" value="transparent" /> <param name="dynamicStreaming" value="true" />
<param name="@videoPlayer" value="3440179711001" />

Should be: 3101360480001
item.summary: Brightcover Player // Change ID for detail page

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Fixed on both Q & P systems.

Note: this information is coming from PIM, so one need also to fix this directly in PIM otherwise we will have the same problem after each pim import.

Hi Nabil,
The Player ID is not coming from PIM. Only the video ID.

In the web shop there's still not the correct ID (3101360480001) for product http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Visuelles-IR-Thermometer%2C--10-%2B250-%C2%B0C-Fluke-FLUKE-VT02/p/11026431?q=fluke+vt02&page=1&origPos=1&origPageSize=10&simi=98.51

<div class="gallery-item video">
<div> <object id="video-3811904421001" class="BrightcoveExperience">
<param name="bgcolor" value="#FFFFFF" />
<param name="width" value="480" />
<param name="height" value="312" />
<param name="playerID" value="3811904421001" />
<param name="playerKey" value="AQ~,AAACUpF3y2k,IByipOot93xrfhhddiTQy3pGfCyK2c2_" />
<param name="isVid" value="true" />
<param name="isUI" value="true" />
<param name="wmode" value="transparent" /> <param name="dynamicStreaming" value="true" />
<param name="@videoPlayer" value="3811904421001" />
</object>
</div>
</div>

The Brightcove ID is unique? Could it be the same for all video media ?

Please clarify this. Thx
It is the same for all video media on all detail pages.

I fixed the problem using the following BeanShell script on P system:

import de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.search.*;
import de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.model.*;
import com.namics.hybris.toolbox.spring.SpringUtil;

query = "select {pk} from {DistVideoMedia} where {catalogVersion}='8796093153881'";

flexibleSearchService = SpringUtil.getBean("flexibleSearchService");
modelService = SpringUtil.getBean("modelService");

videos = flexibleSearchService.search(query).getResult();

for(video: videos) {
    video.setBrightcoveVideoId("3101360480001");
    modelService.save(video);
}

I executed this script on Q as well (with modification of the catalog version PK)
Player is correct now, but the video is still not playing.

Hi Nabil,

I think there was a missunderstanding between your question if the Brightcove Video Id is unique and Florians Anserr.
The field BrightcoveVideoId, that you overrode on all Products was the unique Video ID per Video!! With your beanshell Script, you overode every video id by the player id (3101360480001).

Luckily, the Identifier of each Video Object (see printscreen) is still the original video id. What you have to do now is either automated or manually take the identifier of the video object and copy it to the attribute BrightcoveVideoId for all Products having a video.

Please call me, if there are any questions!

BR Jan

Hi Jan,

Ok I will discuss this topic with florian and see what we can do.

BR, Nabil

Please implement it with the following information:

  • Identifier (Code): VideoID (unique per item) --> Rename the label to "Brightcove Video ID" (if Possible, otherwise tell Florian)
  • BrightcoveVideoID: new => PlayerID (same for all videos) --> Rename the label to "Brightcove Player ID" and the attribute name to brightcovePlayerId
Approved.

Hi Jan,

now we have the following:

     // The Video unique ID
    private String brightcoveVideoId;
    // The Player ID (same for all videos)
    private String brightcovePlayerId;

to access these fields you need just :

${video.brightcoveVideoId} // for the video ID
${video.brightcovePlayerId} // for the player ID

BR, Nabil

Video Works.
Can be tested after next deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4390] Different language entry for our website in Switzerland
item.description:
In my search reports and from reports from customers I see that many people end up on the EN version of our web shop in Switzerland and start searching in their native languages (DE or FR), getting zero result pages.

I set up a campaign to at least inform people to switch languages, however, we need to find a solution that this does not happen as often as it does today, anymore. Either we can change the logic of language selection (default DE, even if EN browser settings & FR if FR settings) or/and by making the selection box more striking so that it is clear for the customer that they can select their own languages. The one we have today rather looks like a banner that is easily clicked away.

UPDATE: The flyout should disappear when the customer clicks on the blue area.
item.summary: Different language entry for our website in Switzerland

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Daniela,
I would suggest the following variants:
1. We deactivate the automatically definition of the shop settings per customer.
2. We replace the shop settings bar from the bottom to the top.

I'll check out what is the best way.

New Mockup attached.
What do you think?
Looks good to me! Just a question: what does the "Einstellung ändern" stand for? Is it a link and if so, where to? If not, I'd remove the "distrelec schweiz" and put Einstellungen ändern:
okay, we'll remove "distrelec schweiz"

Hi Florian,

Should the "Distrelec Schweiz" be removed for all Webshops and also when the dialog is showed after the user clicks on the Settings Link at the top right corner of the page?

BR Jan

Hi Jan,
It is possible to remove it only on this dialog?
Please keep it on the settings that is requested by the customer at the right corner.

Please consider: there is an update on the description above.

Hi Florian,

Yes thats possible..I also adjusted the Description above to be different only the first time, the user sees the dialog.

Ticket will be done today eve. Could you point Nabil out, that we have another request on the pagination ticket?

Thanks BR JAn
.. But the update of the description will also only be on the initial Visit, right? After that, the description as it was until now will be shown!?
Yes correct.

ok..then the ticket is done and can be tested after next deployment.

BR Jan
Why is this on ATOS Q but not on HPQ?

Hi Jan,
This is missing on 3.1.

The code probably got lost during a merge.
Redid the code. Can be tested after Deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3804] Code-Restructuring
item.description: To be implemented as specified in the attached .doc-file

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deployment.
Thanks

Note: For some reason the "5 : 'de'," doesn't want to be aligned on the left without affecting the code
